channel.title: Matrix 718 completionist cape problem
channel.description: I have this problem with matrix completionist cape that requires the wearer to have won 1 game of fight pits and I do not want this as a requirement so can some1 plz tell me how to remove this requirement?

item.title: Matrix 718 completionist cape problem
item.dc:creator: @adamgulka adamgulka
item.description:
@adamgulka wrote:

itemconstants.java

if (itemName.contains("completionist")) { if (player.getSkills().getTotalLevel(player) < 2496) { player.sendMessage("You need a total level of 2496 before you can wear this."); return false; }

Read full topic
